summary: An email from attorney Stuart Kaplan to DOJ attorney Lara Pomerantz, stating he has been retained by retired FBI Special Agent Nesbitt Kuyrkendall in connection with her subpoena to testify in the Ghislaine Maxwell case. The email raises concerns about her ability to prepare for testimony without access to her original interview notes and mentions a prior OPR interview.

persons.name: Stuart Kaplan
persons.role: Managing Partner, Attorney for Nesbitt Kuyrkendall
persons.context: Attorney who sent the email, stating he has been retained by retired FBI Special Agent Nesbitt Kuyrkendall in connection with her subpoena to testify in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

persons.name: Lara Pomerantz
persons.context: Recipient of the email from Stuart Kaplan, addressed as a prosecutor or official in the U.S. Department of Justice.

persons.name: Nesbitt Kuyrkendall
persons.context: Retired FBI agent who has been subpoenaed to testify in the United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell case. She has concerns about preparing for testimony without her original interview notes and was previously interviewed by the Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR).

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the case 'United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell' pending in the SDNY, for which Nesbitt Kuyrkendall has been subpoenaed to testify.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of the investigation about which retired FBI agent Nesbitt Kuyrkendall was interviewed by the Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR).

connections.description: Stuart Kaplan states he has been 'formerly retained' by Nesbitt Kuyrkendall to represent her in connection with her subpoena to testify in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
Nesbitt Kuyrkendall has been subpoenaed to testify in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.
Kuyrkendall was interviewed by the Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) regarding her recollection of events in the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.
Kaplan is communicating with Pomerantz, a DOJ attorney, regarding his client's (Kuyrkendall's) concerns and testimony coordination.

events.title: Subpoena of Retired FBI Agent
events.description: Retired FBI Special Agent Nesbitt Kuyrkendall has been subpoenaed to testify in the United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell case pending in the Southern District of New York (SDNY).

events.title: OPR Interview of Retired FBI Agent
events.description: Nesbitt Kuyrkendall was interviewed under oath by the FBI's Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) just prior to her retirement, regarding her recollection of events in the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.

keyFacts: Retired FBI Special Agent Nesbitt Kuyrkendall has been subpoenaed to testify in the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case.

Kuyrkendall's attorney, Stuart Kaplan, raises concerns that she cannot properly prepare for testimony because she has not been given a copy of her original interview notes (1A notes) that preceded the official FD-302 report.
Kuyrkendall was previously interviewed under oath by the FBI's Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) regarding the Jeffrey Epstein investigation, just prior to her retirement.
The attorney directs that all future contact with his client, Kuyrkendall, must be coordinated through his office.
